articles.title: UBS Names Global Banking Leadership Team Amid Credit Suisse Integration - Bloomberg
articles.description: UBS Group AG is revamping the leadership of its investment banking division, as the lender presses ahead with its integration of former rival Credit Suisse.
articles.content:
UBS Group AG is revamping the leadership of its investment banking division, as the lender presses ahead with its integration of former rival Credit Suisse.

articles.author: Chloe Cornish
articles.title: China's Ant Group swaps stake in India's Paytm for debt - Financial Times
articles.description: Geopolitical tensions simmer as New Delhi cracks down on Chinese companies in the country
articles.content:
Jack Ma-founded Ant Group will swap nearly half its equity stake in Indian payments company Paytm for convertible debt, as geopolitical tension lingers between India and China.
